name: ENHANCE High Precision 6-Button Optical Gaming Mouse with 3500 DPI & Color-Changing LED Body
categoryPath: Electronics/Computers/Computer Accessories/Keyboards, Mice & Joysticks/Mice & Mice Pads

reviews.name: ENHANCE High Precision 6-Button Optical Gaming Mouse with 3500 DPI & Color-Changing LED Body
reviews.reviewText: The DPI settings are super easy to use and mouse feels solid. Cool cord as well and seems rather tough. Really enjoying the LED colors especially when the lights are dimmed. Overall a great mouse and the hot keys are a very nice addition!
reviews.title: A gaming mouse with style!

reviews.name: ENHANCE High Precision 6-Button Optical Gaming Mouse with 3500 DPI & Color-Changing LED Body
reviews.reviewText: Awesome mouse n priced cheap i replaced my logitech g5 with this new mouse
reviews.title: awesome mouse

reviews.name: ENHANCE High Precision 6-Button Optical Gaming Mouse with 3500 DPI & Color-Changing LED Body
reviews.reviewText: Great mouse. Needed something under $40 that I could travel with and this out performs my $80+ mouse. Great dpi settings and weighted perfectly for me. Headshot all day in CS:GO.
reviews.title: Great gaming mouse at even better price

reviews.name: ENHANCE High Precision 6-Button Optical Gaming Mouse with 3500 DPI & Color-Changing LED Body
reviews.reviewText:
I play Counter Strike: Global Offensive competitively. Recently used a Razer Naga, And Steel Series Sensei. This mouse can't really compare to the Naga, But a bit to the Sensei with the design.

Pros : Cool lights, Does the job. No mouse acceleration, And aim is on point.

Cons : Feels a bit lite on the front, And heavy on the back. So for that reason (the way i play) sometimes the the mouse skips. Also, The rotation wheel got squeaky, And loose within the 1st week.

For the price, The mouse is decent. Would it be my 1st recommendation? No.
Depending on the persons price range, I might recommend this mouse.
reviews.title: Not the best, But fair for the price.

reviews.name: ENHANCE High Precision 6-Button Optical Gaming Mouse with 3500 DPI & Color-Changing LED Body
reviews.reviewText: Good fit for hand, nice speed, cute color change, seams to work great
reviews.title: Nice gaming mouse
